Package io.github.ndanhkhoi.telegram.bot.annotation

Annotation Interface CommandMapping

@Target(METHOD) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface CommandMapping

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    String[]
    value
    An array of commands to handle

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    long[]
    accessGroupIds
    An id array of groups can call a command
    long[]
    accessMemberIds
    An id array of users in group can call a command
    long[]
    accessUserIds
    An id array of users can call a command
    boolean
    allowAllGroupAccess
    A flag to mark a command can be called by any groups
    boolean
    allowAllUserAccess
    A flag to mark a command can be called by everyone
    boolean
    disableWebPagePreview
    A flag to disable webpage preview on message
    boolean
    onlyAdmin
    A flag to mark a command can be called by admin (of a group)
    boolean
    onlyForGroup
    A flag to mark a command can be called in groups
    boolean
    onlyForOwner
    A flag to mark a command can be called by owner
    boolean
    onlyForPrivate
    A flag to mark a command can be called in private chat
    MessageParseMode
    parseMode
    Send result as HTML or Markdown or Plain text
    MediaType
    sendFile
    Reply media message.

  • Element Details

    • value

      String[] value
      An array of commands to handle

    • parseMode

      MessageParseMode parseMode
      Send result as HTML or Markdown or Plain text
      Default:
      PLAIN

    • disableWebPagePreview

      boolean disableWebPagePreview
      A flag to disable webpage preview on message
      Default:
      false

    • accessUserIds

      long[] accessUserIds
      An id array of users can call a command
      Default:
      {}

    • accessMemberIds

      long[] accessMemberIds
      An id array of users in group can call a command
      Default:
      {}

    • accessGroupIds

      long[] accessGroupIds
      An id array of groups can call a command
      Default:
      {}

    • allowAllUserAccess

      boolean allowAllUserAccess
      A flag to mark a command can be called by everyone
      Default:
      false

    • allowAllGroupAccess

      boolean allowAllGroupAccess
      A flag to mark a command can be called by any groups
      Default:
      false

    • onlyAdmin

      boolean onlyAdmin
      A flag to mark a command can be called by admin (of a group)
      Default:
      false

    • onlyForGroup

      boolean onlyForGroup
      A flag to mark a command can be called in groups
      Default:
      false

    • onlyForPrivate

      boolean onlyForPrivate
      A flag to mark a command can be called in private chat
      Default:
      false

    • sendFile

      MediaType sendFile
      Reply media message.
      See Also:
      • MediaType
      Default:
      DOCUMENT

    • onlyForOwner

      boolean onlyForOwner
      A flag to mark a command can be called by owner
      Default:
      false
